objects.specification: A large rectangular floor plane with a smooth light gray finish, providing a uniform base for the entire classroom environment.
An interior wall panel painted white with a smooth finish and minimal trim, forming the front boundary of the classroom.
An interior wall panel painted white with a smooth finish and minimal trim, forming the back boundary of the classroom.
An interior wall panel painted white with a smooth finish and minimal trim, forming the left boundary of the classroom.
An interior wall panel painted white with a smooth finish and minimal trim, forming the right boundary of the classroom.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white writing surface and a thin metallic silver frame around the edges, ideal for clear visibility of presentations and notes.
A rectangular teacher’s desk finished in a darker wood tone, featuring a smooth tabletop, modesty panel at the front, and sturdy square legs with visible wood grain texture.
A comfortable teacher’s chair upholstered in blue fabric, with a cushioned seat and backrest, supported by a simple metal frame and four legs.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a matte light gray casing, rectangular body, and a front-facing lens surrounded by subtle ventilation grilles.
A tall wooden bookshelf in darker wood tone, with five evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted colorful books, a closed back panel, and slightly beveled edges.
A tall wooden bookshelf in darker wood tone, with five evenly spaced shelves filled with assorted colorful books, a closed back panel, and slightly beveled edges.
A large frameless glass window with clear transparent pane and a slim white-painted frame to match the interior walls.
A blue fabric curtain with soft pleats, hanging from a concealed rod, offering a gentle drape around the window opening.
A blue fabric curtain with soft pleats, hanging from a concealed rod, offering a gentle drape around the window opening.
A circular wall clock with a black metal frame, white face, bold black numerals, and slim black hands in a modern minimalist style.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of gray plastic with an open top and smooth matte finish.
A round ceramic plant pot in dark gray with a smooth surface and a subtle metal saucer at the base.

children.specification: A lush green foliage arrangement with broad textured leaves, forming a dense canopy above the pot to simulate a healthy indoor plant.
